title: AbonaVida
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Pizza, Organic, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An ecological cafe offering mostly vegetarian and vegan food, labeled. Large selection of beverages. Sources fairtrade products. Relaxed atmosphere with table seating, sofas, and a small terrace. A space for hosting activities downstairs.
